metadata.name: IRAN-MA
metadata.description:
https://9dal.com/

زن زندگی آزادی

Zan - Zendegi - Azadi

#womanlifefreedom

#mahsaamini

مهسا امینی 


According to her family and local media, Jina "Mahsa" Amini, 22, was arrested by Iran's morality police on September 13 for "improperly" wearing her hijab and severely beaten. She died three days later while still in police custody.

Protests erupted across Iran after news of the heinous incident broke (thanks in part to reporters Niloofar Hamedi and Elahe Mohammadi, who have since been imprisoned by the Iranian regime). Women led them, ripping off their hijabs, cutting their hair, and chanting "women, life, freedom."
